articles.author: Sam Anderson
articles.title: Promising Science Could Unlock Insights into Australia's Ancient Humans » Explorersweb - ExplorersWeb
articles.description: Researchers are using a shocking — literally — method to model what ancient Australian habitations could have looked like.
articles.content:
The planets first Australians lived on a continent wholly different from what now exists.
To anyone familiar with the concepts of continental drift and climate change, that may not be a surprise. Bu… [+3900 chars]

articles.title: Newly Discovered Dinosaur Iani May Have Been Species' “Last Gasp” in a Changing Planet - SciTechDaily

articles.content:
ByNorth Carolina State UniversityJune 10, 2023
